## 表格合并



```{r}
rm(list = ls())
library(readxl)
brca_clin <- read_xlsx("F:/R_books/R_beginners/brca_clin.xlsx", col_names = T)

df1 <- brca_clin[,1:4]
df2 <- brca_clin[,5:9]
```


```{r}
cbind(df1, df2)
```
